trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lake Havasu City
There was one other sighting in Lake Havasu City on or around November 30th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my backyard in Lake Havasu, AZ and noticed that one part of the sky was a brilliant orange and yellow, like fire. I got my camera and took a picture of what I saw. I did not notice the object at the time. It wasn't until I looked at it downloaded on my computer that I saw what looks like a spaceship in the photo. I also took pictures of the surrounding sky and it did not look the same as this spot. The spot where I photographed this object was over Lake Havasu about a mile and half from my home.
Summary: While taking pictures of an extremely bright sky, I caught the picture which I have attached.
